trans-unit.source: Exposes <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonComboBox" /> types to UI Automation.
trans-unit.target: Espone i tipi <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonComboBox" /> all'automazione interfaccia utente.

trans-unit.source: The element associated with this automation peer.
trans-unit.target: Elemento associato a questo peer di automazione.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonComboBoxAutomationPeer" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza della classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonComboBoxAutomationPeer" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of child elements of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonComboBox" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonComboBoxAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene la raccolta di elementi figlio dell’oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonComboBox" /> associato all'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonComboBoxAutomationPeer" />.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetChildren" />.
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo viene chiamato da <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetChildren" />.

trans-unit.source: The child elements of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonComboBox" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonComboBoxAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: Elementi figlio dell'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonComboBox" /> associato all'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonComboBoxAutomationPeer" /> corrente.

trans-unit.source: A value enumeration that specifies the control pattern.
trans-unit.target: Enumerazione di valori che specifica il pattern di controllo.

trans-unit.source: Gets the control pattern for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonComboBox" /> that is associated with the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonComboBoxAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene il pattern di controllo per l'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonComboBox" /> associato a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonComboBoxAutomationPeer" />.

trans-unit.source: An object that supports the control pattern if <paramref name="patternInterface" /> is the <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.ExpandCollapse" />, <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.ItemContainer" />, <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.Scroll" />, <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.SynchronizedInput" />, <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.Transform" />, or <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.Value" /> value, this method returns an object that supports the control pattern; otherwise, <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto che supporta il pattern di controllo se <paramref name="patternInterface" /> è <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.ExpandCollapse" />, <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.ItemContainer" />, <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.Scroll" />, <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.SynchronizedInput" />, <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.Transform" /> o il valore <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.Value" />. Questo metodo restituisce un oggetto che supporta il criterio di controllo; altrimenti, <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonComboBox" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonComboBoxAutomationPeer" /> is read-only
trans-unit.target: Ottiene un valore che indica se l’elemento <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonComboBox" /> associato a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonComboBoxAutomationPeer" /> è di sola lettura.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonComboBox" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonComboBoxAutomationPeer" /> is not enabled; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se l'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonComboBox" /> associato a questo oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonComboBoxAutomationPeer" /> non è abilitato; in caso contrario, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: Sets the keyboard focus on the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonComboBox" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonComboBoxAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: Imposta lo stato attivo da tastiera sull'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonComboBox" /> associato all'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonComboBoxAutomationPeer" />.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.SetFocus" />.
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo viene chiamato da <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.SetFocus" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonComboBox" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonComboBoxAutomationPeer" /> did not get focus.
trans-unit.target: L'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonComboBox" /> associato con questo oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonComboBoxAutomationPeer" /> non riceve lo stato attivo.

trans-unit.source: The value to set the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonComboBox.Text" /> property to.
trans-unit.target: Valore su cui impostare la proprietà <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonComboBox.Text" />.

trans-unit.source: Sets the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonComboBox.Text" /> property of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonComboBox" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonComboBoxAutomationPeer" /> to the specified value.
trans-unit.target: Imposta la proprietà <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonComboBox.Text" /> dell'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonComboBox" /> associato a questo oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonComboBoxAutomationPeer" /> sul valore specificato.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonComboBox" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonComboBoxAutomationPeer" /> is not enabled.
trans-unit.target: L'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonComboBox" /> associato a questo oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonComboBoxAutomationPeer" /> non è abilitato.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="value" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="value" /> è <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonComboBox.Text" /> property of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonComboBox" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonComboBoxAutomationPeer" />
trans-unit.target: Ottiene la proprietà <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonComboBox.Text" /> di <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonComboBox" /> associata con <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonComboBoxAutomationPeer" />

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonComboBox.Text" /> property of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonComboBox" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonComboBoxAutomationPeer" />
trans-unit.target: La proprietà <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonComboBox.Text" /> di <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonComboBox" /> che è associata con questo <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonComboBoxAutomationPeer" />
